nodes.text: Imperial Naval Regulation 132.CAT.ch(22) stated that shooting an escape pod outside of an armed engagement with an intensity classified as above Category V required the gunnery captain to file a Form XTM-51-CT to explain why the action was necessary. That regulation was adopted so that members of the Imperial Senate would not accuse the Imperial Navy of committing war crimes.
The Imperial Naval Regulation 132.CAT.ch(22) was first mentioned in The Sith of Datawork, a short story published in From a Certain Point of View.
